doc.name: FrontDropQueue
doc.author: Yang Zhao, based on Queue by Jie Liu, Christopher Hylands
doc.port: An output port that sends the length of queue. The default type is integer.
An output port that sends dropped packets. The default type is the same as the type of the input port
doc.property: The capacity of the queue. The initial default value is an integer with the value of 1.
